name: Circle Invaders
description:
Controls

- WASD to move

- E to shoot (hold down for a few seconds)

Instructions

You will have to put the game on fullscreen.
Your task is to shoot all circles you see on your screen with all your fury! This is an infinite game that you cannot die in, when you hit a circle, you get smaller and smaller. The more score you have, the faster the circles move.

Windows only
Made for the Floppy Disk Game Jam hosted by JAFYgames

All graphics are made using the Windows command line
